content.content: A professional-grade corporate platform developed for P&R Arquitectos S.R.L., a prominent architecture and engineering firm with over 20 years of industry experience. The project emphasizes modern UI/UX principles, featuring dynamic content management and strategic Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) through integrated communication channels.

content.caption: Homepage featuring an automated dynamic carousel.

content.content: Dynamic Carousel System: A custom-engineered image transition engine supporting automatic cycles, manual overrides, touch gestures, and keyboard accessibility.
JSON-Driven Portfolio Management: A modular project system that asynchronously loads data into interactive modals, allowing for scalable content updates without structural changes.
Persistent Theme Architecture: Support for Dark/Light modes utilizing LocalStorage for preference persistence and CSS transitions for visual fluidity.
Design Patterns: Developed using Object-Oriented JavaScript (ES6+), adopting a class-based architecture to separate concerns. The project follows a mobile-first, progressive enhancement strategy.
SEO: Semantically structured HTML5, optimized metadata, and PWA manifest implementation for enhanced search visibility.
Accessibility: Strict adherence to WCAG 2.1 AA standards, including ARIA labels, keyboard focus management, and optimized contrast ratios.
This corporate solution demonstrates the effective synthesis of aesthetic design and technical performance, providing a scalable, accessible, and high-conversion platform for enterprise requirements.
